//: swift attacker whose main purpose is to alert the rest of the unit to the presence of a player. fast but won't overcome dedicated armor.
description: A heavily modified body of a canine, barely a shell of its former self that has been marred by machinery. A suite of infernal sensory equiptment is mounted where its head once was and taut hydraulic limbs are attatched to its torso. While it can no longer bite as easily, the blades attached to its legs appear to more than make up for this.

//: sack of hp that wants to crush you to death, or at least hold you down for others to beat on. fortunately quite clumsy
description: The majestic and already terrifying moose, now twisted into some sort of ponderous industrial monstrosity. A pneumatic jaw hangs heavy from its head, snatching and pulverizing organic matter for use by its dark masters.

//: fairly average enemy intended more as a worker who can bring pain with great numbers when angered
name: grafter legion
description: A human, ruthlessly bolted into what appears to be an exoskeleton that provides the basics in protection and modesty. They march to and fro  stiff-legged, performing labor at the direction at the behest of some unseen overseer. Hopefully you're not due to be processed at the moment.

//: skirmisher with nasty attack. just as armored as soldier z. one is fine but additional ones get nasty quick
name: grafter despot
description: A human, ruthlessly crammed into what appears to be a tightly wound combat exoskeleton, armed with a crackling shock baton. From their feverish, maniacal grin, they clearly gain pleasure from hunting others.

//: heavy duty brute armed with a chainsaw, opens up walls - and you - for its friends. will total an unprepared player
name: grafter sledge
description: A towering horror that looks like the fusion of several human bodies and a variety of machines, stitched together in a hideous mass of destructive potential. Hydraulic muscles hiss in time with the pulsing of eerie runes inscribed on its thick armor plating, and a buzzsaw attatched to one of its forearms purrs ominously.

//: support unit. brings some much-needed ranged ability. symbol & is a bit arbitrary but I wanted to indicate that they're the same species as the hierarch
name: grafter prelate
description: A small being hidden inside the folds of a beautiful swirling robe, a sharp juxtaposition with the brutally around it, though no less touched by machinery. Levitating slightly off the ground, it uses its telekinetic ability to facilitate the construction of new cyborgs, and when cornered, hammers its enemies with psychic blasts.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s telekineticly engulfs %3$s in a storm of swirling debris!

//: local leader with slightly better developed psychic powers
name: grafter hierarch
description: A mysterious creature cloaked in a stunningly beautiful esoteric shroud. Underneath the swirls of fabric you catch a glimpse of frail ethereal body, being kept alive by machinery only a little more graceful than what is attatched to those around it. Are these entities architects of this madness? Or are they victims themselves?

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s telekineticly engulfs %3$s in a storm of swirling debris!
